QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( select physician_id as provider_id, case when medical_specialty is null or medical_specialty in ('', 'NULL', 'Not Mapped', 'Not a Medical Speciality', 'Undefined / Unknown', 'No Value / Undefined', 'Not a Medical Specialty, Not Active', 'Not a Medical Specialty, Obsolete') THEN 1 ELSE 0 end as spec_idx ,medical_specialty as specialty_source_value from {sc}.hf_d_physician ), b as ( select provider_id, min(spec_idx) as min_spec_idx from a group by provider_id )
select a.provider_id, max(a.specialty_source_value) as specialty_source_value from a join b on a.provider_id = b.provider_id and a.spec_idx = b.min_spec_idx group by a.provider_id
